articles.title: Inflation cools slightly in November as worries about affordability grip Americans - NPR
articles.description: The cost of living in November was up 2.7% from a year ago, according to a report Thursday from the Labor Department.  That's a smaller annual increase than for the 12 months ending in September.
articles.content:
The cost of living continued to climb in November though a little less than two months ago as 7 in 10 Americans say they're barely able to pay their bills. 
Consumer prices in November were up 2.7% … [+3124 chars]
